div.ab:
P. L. Bat. 25 69 (English)
Recto - - -] in order that also the part should be shipped by us instead of by you, and he said [- - - that the other(?)] tax-collectors shipped (the grain) among the first and if I need more grain in order that [- - -] and at the request he went down (to the ship?) and said that, what he wanted [- - - we shipped] among the first our grain, before the other tax-collectors [- - -] the landowner was drugged in order that he should accept more [- - -] sail on the tenth day to the estate and I hope that not [- - -] the month passed. [- - -] He showed us - - - Verso [- - -] - - - and if he had not communicated to me about - - - [- - -] - - - and I received the grain - - - more than the other tax-collectors - - - [- - -] - - - and in order that not be collected - - - [- - -] - - - the twentieth. However, from the first hour - - - [- - -] - - - there in order that - - - he spends time (?) for you on the grain - - -
